Set Up Service Replies for Chat

Personalize customer service and save agent’s time in just a few steps.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

Warning: If you enable Service Replies, it replaces classic Reply Recommendations. You can’t use both features simultaneously.

Enable Einstein Service Replies
Give agents access to Service Replies in the Einstein Reply Recommendations component by assigning them a permission set.
